# Pancito de Vida - Restaurant Order Management App

## Project Overview
React Native TypeScript application for Android to manage restaurant orders.

## Modules
- Home: Main menu with functionality buttons
- Orders: View orders across 4 tables
- New Order: Create orders with table selection or free zone
- Dishes: Manage dishes in categories (Breakfast, Lunch, Drinks, Others)
- Statistics: Daily reports and sales dashboard

## Next Steps

Para generar el APK de la aplicación:

```bash
cd android
gradlew assembleRelease
```

El APK estará en: `android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk`
